availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jacob T. Young (Lyon County, Kentucky, sheriff)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, sheriff. Tennessee, native. Son of Thomas S. Young and Sarah Young. Married to Mary A. Boyd Young in Lyon County on April 28, 1855. Father of Mildred B. Young. Sheriff in Lyon County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville,766.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lyon County Marriages, Film #000321364, p. 79.
KYR-0001-004-0187.
